title: Serif like Garamond
author: VITAMINADO

comments.content: It looks like a manually compressed/emboldened **[Century Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112359/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Century%20Old%20Style%20-%20Regular&fid=d2353b72245ef934893e134fa27d521f&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=Vegetana&fit=1)** which is further deteriorated by a rasterization/vectorization process
